value.title: Dubai Diaries: When a robot delivers pizza
value.excerpt: I knew it was my seven-cheese pizza — so I fished out a Dh5 bill from my wallet for the rider who came all the way to our desert village just to bring me my lunch. But when I opened the door, the pizza box was already at our doorstep and no one was there — except a robot rolling away.
